title: Alpha client issue (post reinstall)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

replies.body: If you were initially getting stuck at 0% then you might have a persisting security issue that's not properly allowing your game files to scan.  I recommend starting with the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your pc is allowing access to your game files.  You may need to reinstall the updated version from there.  I hope that helps!
I guess that was the problem, thank you very much.
